name: Nuclear_Reprocessing_Overhaul
title: Nuclear Reprocessing Overhaul
author: thinkcraftpl
description:
Nuclear Fuel Reprocessing now gives also 5 iron plates.
Adds recipe in assembler that takes 5 used-up uranium fuel cells and gives 5 iron plates (does not give uranium-238, but is made in cheaper machine), takes 60s.
